Real transparency for the gaps between cards and buttons. No sharp corners, all rounded. No images save for the .jpg card backgrounds. Card shapes adapt to changes in button size and shape - try changing just the font-size of the button elements to see. This requires no JS - it's all in the magic of CSS subgrid!
